title: Kuroko no Basket: Oshaberi Shiyokka
content:
A fan disc where everyone can do whatever they want, that's literally the fourth breaking wall they keep repeating the whole episode. The Seirin gang is chilling at the cheapest McDonald's rip-off while commenting over what happened on the first season in a very comedic way. The cream of the top really resides on the arrival of the members of the generation of miracles, the out-of-character act was precious and good of a reason to watch this 9 minutes special, the sight of Aomine acting along makes him loo so approachable unlike the main show thought us.

Under the cover “Kuroko no Basket: Oshaberi Shiyokka” isjust another recap episode trying to be quirky and sneaky about it, although, I do appreciate the original content even if it made no sense canonically.
